work.summary: Part of the Cybersecurity team, I developed a vulnerability scanner with Python and the ELK Stack. The application was deployed on a Kubernetes Cluster using an Helm Chart and produced in a DevOps environment (with Gitlab, Jenkins & Artifactory).
